title: New: Isles – Bayview (Demo)
content:
As with their debut track National Seashore, Pensacola outfit Isles make sure to reiterate the point that these songs are very much works in progress, and by no means the finished product.

Fairly impressive really when you consider the standard they’ve already set with these initial two demos. Whilst National Seashore cut an upbeat, sensual figure, Bayview is a more reserved affair, utilizing the layered vocals to sublime effect. It may still be early days for Isles, but these couple of outings suggest that they have a mightily exciting future ahead of them.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
